body_html:
I can reproduce this issue
after I change bazel back to 0.3.0 and 0.2.3, the problem still there.
env:
xubuntu 16.04.1
gcc/g++ 4.9.3
bazel 0.3.1 0.3.0 0.2.3
python 2.7.12
cuda 8.0rc
cudnn 5.0.5
